last_episode_to_air.name: Episode Eight
last_episode_to_air.overview: At the solemn mercy of a motherfucker and his rusty hedge-clippers.

name: Shit Creek
overview: When a small time crook clocks out after a freak accident in a Sydney pub, it's left to his two sons to pick up his debt to the mob. They have six weeks to cough up a 100 grand or they'll find themselves without their favourite appendages.
